name: Hyperliquid
notes: Using /info spotMeta + l2Book to simulate order-book fills for HYPE/USDC; adapter works without Hypertrade and records depth used per quote.

name: Project X
notes: No public API yet; Hypertrade leg filter provides quote coverage when liquidity routes through Project X pools.

name: HyperSwap
notes: Docs outline router + quoter; TypeScript adapter uses QUOTER_V2 directly for WHYPE/USDC trades.

name: Hybra
notes: Protocol teasers but no API docs; adapter relies on Hypertrade-provided Hybra legs until official quoter is exposed.

name: Upheaval Finance
notes: Governance posts confirm AMM launch; Hypertrade leg isolation supplies interim WHYPE/USDC quotes pending router ABI release.

name: Kittenswap Finance
notes: Docs + GitHub repo supply Algebra pools; adapter now calls native Quoter for deterministic WHYPE/USDC quotes.

name: Curve Finance
notes: Curve docs reference Router + curve-js; adapter currently filters Hypertrade legs tagged curve while curve-js integration is staged.

name: Gliquid
notes: Launch blog references HyperEVM pools; Hypertrade leg filter covers Gliquid liquidity until ABI/HTTP docs are published.

name: Drip.Trade
notes: API site lists quote schema; adapter temporarily leverages Hypertrade legs tagged drip.trade while direct REST authentication is finalized.

name: HyperBrick
notes: Gitbook lists router addresses; Hypertrade leg isolation supplies quotes until quoter ABI verified.

name: HX Finance
notes: Site previews HX pools but omits API; Hypertrade leg filter used pending SDK release.

name: Hypertrade
notes: Docs describe POST /trade/getSwapInfo; client now supports dexWhitelist to target single DEX legs for research staging.

name: 1inch
notes: Classic Swap API v6 exposes /quote and /swap endpoints; API key recommended for production.

name: 0x
notes: Swap API v1 returns executable calldata with gas estimates; API key optional.

name: Odos
notes: Smart Order Router (SOR) API supports POST /sor/quote for route discovery.

name: ParaSwap
notes: Price API delivers best route quotes and calldata; higher throughput available with API key.

name: Ramses v3
notes: Ramses v3 AMM docs covering pool/router configuration; integrated through Hypertrade legs.
